title: HF DC Bias Unit
subtitle: 3 models: 20 Hz to 5 MHz, 20 Hz to 30 MHz, and 20 Hz to 120 MHz

paragraphs: The 6565 HF DC Bias Unit is a specialized accessory designed to work seamlessly with the Wayne Kerr 6500 series analyzers, including both the 6500B Precision Impedance Analyzer and the 6500P HF LCR Meter. Its primary function is to supply DC bias current to the Device Under Test (DUT) during AC measurements, enhancing the testing capabilities of the 6500 series analyzers for comprehensive component analysis.

applications: Measuring inductance variations under different DC bias current levels
Conducting comparative frequency sweep for impedance and phase angle measurements
Quality control in electronic component manufacturing
Applying varying DC bias currents during tests

features.title: DC Bias Current Supply
features.description: Provides up to 10 A of DC current per unit, with the capability to connect up to eight units in parallel for a maximum output of 80 A

features.title: Compatibility and Versatility
features.description: Compatible with any 6500 analyzer model, offering flexibility across a wide range of frequencies from 20 Hz to 120 MHz, depending on the chosen 6565 model

features.title: Integrated Measurement Display
features.description: Features a digital ammeter for monitoring DC bias current values and an indicator LED for bias current status

features.title: Enhanced Measurement Techniques
features.description: Supports sophisticated measurement strategies, including the sweeping of DC Bias Current from 0A up to the DUT's rated maximum and frequency sweeps at different DC bias current levels for comparative analysis

features.title: Safety and Protection
features.description: Equipped with Wayne Kerr fixtures that include a safety interlock circuit and additional protection circuits to safeguard both the operator and the equipment under potential fault conditions

specifications.heading: Measurement Functions
content: The 6565 series of DC bias units must be used in conjunction with either the 6500B Precision Impedance Analyzer or the 6500P HF LCR Meter

specifications.heading: Compliance Voltage
content: 9V maximum at 1 V ac drive level
10V maximum at 0.25 V ac drive level

specifications.heading: Basic Accuracy
content: Â±1%, Varies with measurement speed, frequency and options chosen

specifications.heading: Measurement Fixtures
content: 1026 is applicable for currents up to 20 A and the 1027 for currents up to 40 A
For SMD use the 1031 adaptor must be used in addition to the selected 1026 or 1027

specifications.heading: Input Specification
content: Universal 85 to 265 V AC, 47 to 63 Hz
Unit powers up automatically when connected to a powered analyzer. Isolating switch provided

specifications.heading: Measurement Connections
content: I2C bus link controls application of DC current and monitors status of analyzer
Status data includes excessive voltage drop and over temperature
